entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 27 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning then 30 percent chance of rain showers late in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning then northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High 15. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 27 April 2023
